text: Catharina "Nina" Hagen (; born 11 March 1955) is a German singer-songwriter, and actress. She was part of the punk and new wave movements in the late 1970s and early 1980s. Her debut album NunSexMonkRock, was very popular when it was released. Her two other albums, Fearless (1983) and Nina Hagen in Ekstasy (1985), were also popular. Her mother was actress and singer Eva-Maria Hagen. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:Living people Category:German singer-songwriters Category:German voice actors Category:German rock musicians Category:Musicians from Berlin Category:Singers from Berlin Category:Actors from Berlin Category:Writers from Berlin Category:New wave singers
title: Nina Hagen
